page.title: 14Recreation in Fraserburgh
page.content: The town has several{Indoor and {Outdoor Bowling clubs,two Swimming {pools, a Golf club, Football clubs and {a Football ground, and a Cricket club. There are{Table-tennis, Putting and {Skateboard facilities}and it is hoped to revive the once very active{Tennis club.The Academy and the Banff & Buchan College of Further Education have{Athletics and Gymnastics facilities and the{Broch Centre}has {Squash, Badminton, Carpet Bowling and {Weight-training. { Judo, Karate, Fencing, Archery, {Riding, Yoga, Keep Fit, BMX Cycling are all actively pursued and the less energetic activities of{Bridge, Darts, {Pool, Dominoes, and crib.Highland- {Modern- and Country Dancing,and Piping take place, also{Flower Arranging. These all take place in pubs, clubs, halls and schools throughout the week.
